function RIR_EP05_16()
    -- .結-1【3月第1週】「姫ギャルの消失」
    SaveData.Title = "姫ギャルの消失"

    -- //BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM14.wav")

    MSG([[ Just as I was about to sleep to prepare for tomorrow's Princess Election, Akira suddenly noticed something troubling. ]])

    -- //BU：アキラ・部屋着（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Normal
 "Rira-pon hasn't come online at all. Do you know anything about this?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Smirk
 "Could it be that something naughty happened and she's shocked or something?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Flustered
 "Naughty? What naughty thing!? N-nothing happened!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ To be exact, nothing happened because it couldn't be made to happen... ]])

    MSG([[ I'm going to keep quiet because I'd probably be messed with to death. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Normal
 "Hmm. That's strange... The SNS that connects me and Rira-pon notifies me when she comes online." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Serious
 "We promised to dive into the test server starting today together... It's weird she hasn't come online by now." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Surprised
 "Maybe she went straight to sleep after coming home? The Princess Election is tomorrow, so maybe she slept to be in top condition." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Sad
 "Rira-pon, who plays games until midnight even the night before an important shoot? Has love really changed her?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Sad
 "Hmm, that is a little worrying. I'll try calling her." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I tried calling Rira, but no answer. Either her phone was off or out of signal. ]])

    MSG([[ Rira never turns off her phone even while sleeping, so why...? ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s vague unease seemed to grow clearer and clearer in my mind. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Serious
 "No lovey-dovey tweets on her secret Twitter either. Even considering the Princess Election, this is abnormal." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Serious
 "Is there any other way to contact her? She's someone who might run over Minachin, so I'm worried." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "Yeah. I'll try contacting Hiyu-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ When I called Hiyu-san, she knew the phone number of Rira’s family home and agreed to get in touch. She realized that our worry was well-founded. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "...Thank you, Hiyu-san. It’s okay, I’ll solve this problem, so please don’t worry." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "Alright, good night. I'll see you tomorrow at school." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Flustered
 "S-so, what happened...?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "It was worse than I thought. Yuriai Private Academy contacted Rira’s family home." ]])

    PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1181.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "They said ‘Rira will be staying overnight for a school event.’" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Flustered
 "What!? But Minachin was supposed to have seen her off at the station!? Who gave that notification!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "I don’t know. But something definitely happened to Rira." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1183.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "Akira, keep checking SNS for any response from Rira. I’ll check the station." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "I saw Rira pass through the ticket gate properly. If something happened inside the station, maybe a station worker saw something." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Roomwear - Sad
 "Got it. Minachin, don’t do anything reckless... If you end up hospitalized again, I won’t come to visit." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Bitter smile
 "...Yeah. Thanks, I’ll be careful." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I thanked Akira and rushed out into the night. ]])

    -- //BG：駅前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ At the ticket gates where I parted with Rira. ]])

    MSG([[ When I asked the station worker, I got some interesting information. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ警備員
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB12aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("stationofficer_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Station Worker】
 "The blonde gal? Her appearance is distinctive, so I remember her. She went outside once after passing the gates, and that’s it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Flustered
 "Really!? Did she say anything when she left!? There’s a chance she got involved in an incident!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("stationofficer_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Station Worker】
 "Eh!? But yeah, she did seem a bit panicked... She said something like ‘I forgot something at school.’" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1187.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Smile
 "Thank you very much!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Forgot something at school. Whether true or not, I found a thread to follow. ]])

    MSG([[ Whether the clue is true or false, I have to go to Yuriai Private Academy right away. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)

    -- //BG：校門前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG005ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ So I arrived at the front gate of Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ There, I saw a familiar face and shivered. ]])

    -- //BU：素顔３号
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_SM301ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "...You came. Looks like I won the bet after all." ]])
    -- //３号

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1188.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "A-are you the one who told me about the threats to the Himegami family!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ An attractive face, a pitch-black mask. A man emitting a strange aura stood before the school gate. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "Who are you? Don’t tell me you’re the one who kidnapped Rira...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "Correct. Though I only lured her out of the school. A 'princess'-level kidnapping is beyond me." ]])
    -- //３号

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "If you’re looking for the princess gal, she’s in the auditorium. You’d better hurry and rescue her." ]])
    -- //３号

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1190.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "...You expect me to believe you?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0456.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Don’t worry, Minato-kun. He’s on our side." ]])

    -- //BU：素顔３号、ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_SM301ab")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1191.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Surprised
 "D-Daria-san? Why are you here too?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria-san appeared behind me, passed by my side, and then patted the suspicious man on the shoulder, speaking to him. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,-600,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0457.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Wink
 "He’s our ally. He’s been a double agent against Nemesia Himegami." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0458.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Officially, he has to obey the Himegami family orders, but personally, he’s been helping you." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0459.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smile
 "Thanks to him suppressing information that shouldn’t be leaked, Nemesia isn’t aware." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1192.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Surprised
 "I-I see...!? But this guy threatened me because Rira was in danger..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "I meant it as a warning... but it backfired on me." ]])
    -- //３号

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "I apologize for the serious injuries you suffered... I'm really sorry." ]])
    -- //３号

    MSG([[ If this man hadn't warned us, Rira would’ve been in real danger. ]])

    MSG([[ I regret doubting him based on appearance, never expecting he was an ally. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "...To gain Nemesia's trust, I did reveal that you and Rira Hoozuki were dating." ]])
    -- //３号

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "But I didn’t tell her that Rira entered the Princess Election at your request. So Nemesia thinks Rira’s acting solo." ]])
    -- //３号

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "That’s why Nemesia never threatened you regarding Rira, right?" ]])
    -- //３号

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Surprised
 "Y-yes. I never got any harassment or anything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Now that I think about it, it would've been normal for Nemesia to threaten me to stop Rira. ]])

    MSG([[ This guy skillfully limited the info, hiding the relationship between me and Rira behind the scenes. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0460.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "That’s why this time, only Rira was targeted." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0461.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Sad
 "...Sorry about that. We intended to solve this without worrying you, but..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "Hehehe... I told you, Minato would definitely come!" ]])
    -- //３号

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "Well then, as per our bet, I’ll wait here at the school gate." ]])
    -- //３号

    MSG([[ After saying that, the man flopped down on his back in front of the gate. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mysterious Man】
 "Going up against the Himegami family is too risky... Let’s say I was knocked out here by you guys." ]])
    -- //３号

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0462.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Bitter smile & sweat
 "That’s fine. Considering your position in the ‘Phoenix’ group, it’s more help than you could ask for." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0463.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Now, Minato-kun. Let’s head to the auditorium where Rira is being held." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Serious
 "Y-yes!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Following Daria-san, who began moving forward, I stepped into the school at midnight. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1195.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Sad
 "Um, Daria-san... could that man be someone I know well...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0464.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "Don’t say any more than that. If you’re a man, you understand, right?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0465.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Bitter smile
 "Men don’t want their cute juniors to see their dirty side." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1196.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Sad
 "...Yes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1197.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Sad
 (‘Senpai’... I’m sorry I wasn’t able to notice before. Thank you.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ With silent thanks in my heart to the senpai who’s been supporting me, I hurried on. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：校舎前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Just before reaching the auditorium, an unexpected obstruction appeared before us. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //BU：アルメリア（邪悪笑み）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ It was Hermes Himegami. ]])

    PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    MSG([[ But her face showed a terrifying expression unlike anything I had seen before. ]])

    -- //BU：アルメリア（邪悪笑み）、ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01na")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0466.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Hermes... or rather, Arumeria? Let us pass." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】Arumeria - Evil grin
 "Hehehe... That’s impossible, you know? I’m the Himegami family’s greatest masterpiece." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】Arumeria - Evil grin
 "Yes... unlike big sister Daria, I never plot rebellions. I’m the only one who sides with Mother Nemesia." ]])

    MSG([[ The oppressive air, so different from usual, left me unable to move. Her cold beauty, reminiscent of the night, was the opposite of Hermes-san’s usual radiant charm. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】Arumeria - Evil grin
 "Hehehe, you won’t escape either, Minato-kun, who betrayed me." ]])

    MSG([[ Hearing my name, I instinctively stepped back. ]])

    MSG([[ What on earth is happening? I don’t feel like I’m losing physically. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t feel like I can win against this girl in front of me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0467.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Pull yourself together! I’ll buy you time, go ahead!" ]])

    -- //SE：はたかれる音
    PLAY_SE("SEc050.wav")

    MSG([[ Daria-san slapped me awake. At the same time, she jumped on Hermes-san and restrained her movements. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ARU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes?】Arumeria - Serious
 "No matter how strong big sister Daria is, I won’t let you interfere with Mother Nemesia!" ]])

    -- //SE：打撃音
    PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0468.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Guh…!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1198.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Flustered
 "D-Daria-san...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Despite receiving a powerful elbow strike from Hermes-san, Daria-san held her grip. Her determination was clear. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0469.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "I won’t let anything hurt my precious friend anymore... Minato-kun, go quickly!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1199.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual - Flustered
 "Y-yes!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：走る音
    PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
    WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Without hesitation, I ran past Daria-san. Then I headed straight to the auditorium where Rira was waiting. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0470.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Nemesia Himegami intends to crush Rira! You have to save her!" ]])


    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　　◆
    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_17")
end
